text:
Hi Y'all!

I'm a new fintech content writer (think 6 weeks new) transitioning from my previous role as a homeschool mom (15 years teaching my own kids). I'm currently freelance blog writing for the fintech and finance space. So far I've completed four blogs and I'm currently working on two more. I've had two of them published on <http://SimpleMoneyLyfe.com|SimpleMoneyLyfe.com> and I ghost wrote for <http://Lendtable.com|Lendtable.com>. My ultimate goal is to secure a full-time position in fintech content writing.

I'm a life-long learner who is super excited about the career path I've chosen. If you have any career advice or people you think I should talk to in the fintech content writing world I would LOVE all the help/advice I can get.

Have an amazing weekend!

Contact me: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/judithmwong/>
